Name: C_allresidues
Definition: total amount of C for all residues by layer

Name: Chum
Definition: Quantity of C in humus in each layer

Name: efnrac
Definition: effect of mineral nitrogen on the roots

Name: husup_by_cm
Definition: water drainage under each layer of 1 cm

Name: N_allresidues
Definition: total amount of N for all residues by layer

Name: Nhum
Definition: Quantity of N in humus in each layer

Name: p_rl
Definition: percentage of root length in relation to total length

Name: rl
Definition: length of coarse roots plus length of fine roots
